sentences: Arko Pravo Mukherjee (born 19 May 1983), better known by the mononym Arko, is an Indian singer-songwriter and music composer who has worked in the Bollywood film industry since 2012.
Arko Pravo Mukherjee was born on 19 May 1983 in a Bengali Brahmin  family to Apurba Kumar Mukherjee and Mahasweta Mukherjee in Kolkata, West Bengal.

Arko Pravo Mukherjee was born on 19 May 1983 in a Bengali Brahmin  family to Apurba Kumar Mukherjee and Mahasweta Mukherjee in Kolkata, West Bengal. He attended school at Don Bosco School, Park Circus, Kolkata.
Arko graduated with an MBBS medical degree in 2007 from Burdwan Medical College.
He completed his internship at Calcutta Medical College and then in 2008 he shifted to Mumbai to pursue a career in Bollywood film industry as a music director, singer songwriter.
